---
title: "New Tags Deployed"
author: "Jon Peake"
date: "3/28/2023"
sidebar: false
---

On March 28th, FWRI staff caught, identified, measured, and tagged an additional 15 fish, including 9 Common Snook (*Centropomus undecimalis*) and 6 Black Drum (*Pogonias cromis*). We have now tagged a total of 42 fish for this project.
